questions.question_text: How many User records can be imported via Import Wizard?

choices.D: User Records cannot be imported via Import Wizard

discussion.content:
Answer D is correct. Users cannot be imported via Wizard (Data Loader only).
To import accounts, contacts, leads, solutions, person accounts, or articles, click Standard Objects. To import custom objects, click Custom Objects. https://help.salesforce.com/articleView?id=data_import_wizard.htm&type=5

can we import a user record? 

https://help.salesforce.com/articleView?id=data_import_wizard.htm&type=5

Selected Answer: B
https://trailhead.salesforce.com/content/learn/modules/lex_customization/lex_customization_page_layouts
=> You can assign page layouts to different user profiles
After defining page layouts, assign which page layouts users see. A user’s profile determines which page layout he or she sees.

choices.A: Only the dashboard determined by the System Administrator
choices.B: You cannot display a dashboard on the Home Page
choices.C: The first two rows of any of your available dashboards
choices.D: The first row of any available dashboards
choices.E: The Complete Dashboard set by the User himself

discussion.content:
Option C
You can customize the Home tab in Salesforce Classic to include components such as sidebar links, a company logo, a dashboard snapshot, or custom components that you create. A dashboard snapshot is a clipping of the top row of a dashboard’s components. Just like other tabs, you can also assign different home page layouts to different users based on profile.

questions.question_text: What does the dashboard snapshot on the Home Page display?
Customer Portal users can view the tags section of a page, if it is included in a page layout.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.notes_on_entering_filter_criteria.htm&type=5
=> If your organization uses record types, the lookup dialog lists picklist values for all record types. Use the “equals” or “not equal to” operators for these filters.
